name: dynamic year param
description: Test case for dynamic year param
expected_query: with "tae05e511bbbc5c5e1af664f610aa1b2f" as (select COALESCE(trg_pid) as pid, SUM(CASE WHEN comp = true THEN recv_yds ELSE 0 END) as rec_yds_from_plays from "nfl_plays" where not "play_type" = 'NOPL' and "nfl_plays"."year" in (${[2023, ...last_3_years].sort((a, b) => a - b).join(', ')}) and "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG') group by COALESCE(trg_pid)) select "player"."pid", player.fname, player.lname, "tae05e511bbbc5c5e1af664f610aa1b2f"."rec_yds_from_plays" AS "rec_yds_from_plays_0", "player"."pos" from "player" left join "tae05e511bbbc5c5e1af664f610aa1b2f" on "tae05e511bbbc5c5e1af664f610aa1b2f"."pid" = "player"."pid" group by player.fname, player.lname, "tae05e511bbbc5c5e1af664f610aa1b2f"."rec_yds_from_plays", "player"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by 4 DESC NULLS LAST, "player"."pid" asc limit 500
